data.title: Eurovision Azerbaijan fan club to organize concert sponsored by Nar Mobile
data.meta_description: Nar Mobile communication operator was announced the official partner of Eurovision Azerbaijan Fan Club, the company said today.
data.text:
Azerbaijan, Baku, May 27 / Trend /

Nar Mobile communication operator was announced the official partner of Eurovision Azerbaijan Fan Club, the company said today.

Thus, Nar Mobile will extend its support to all organizational issues of fan club, including promotion of Azerbaijan at global level and other issues. In order to increase public interest on the eve of this European Song Contest, Eurovision Azerbaijan Fan Club will organize a broad concert program on seaside national park on April 29. World known singers like Emin Agalarov, AniLorak, Diana Gurskaya, AnriChokhadze and others will impress the capital city residents by their performances.

"Nar Mobile" is very delighted to be the official sponsor of Eurovision Azerbaijan Fan Club. We will spare no efforts in providing our support to the promotion of Azerbaijan and making Eurovision Song Contest 2012 more solemn, colourful and unforgettable. As our first step, we are going to organize the concert on the national seaside park on April 29.

The concert to be held with participation of foreign singers invited to the country will become a very good example of our commitment to our citizens and people. On that day, we will present you the true joyous atmosphere and invite everybody to join the concert," - said Jurgen Peetz, Azerfon CompanyCEO.

It should be noted that the comprehensive concert program will last from 16:00 until 20:00 on the national seaside park on April 29. The entrance is totally free.

The Eurovision Azerbaijan Fan Club has been officially established in 2008. Mentioned fan club promotes Azerbaijan in Eurovision Song Contest 2012 starting from the current year. Currently, the fan club has mobilized 100.000 users from social networks.

Azerfon Company known under the Nar Mobilebrand has started its activities in 2007. Currently, the Azerfon Company network covers 80% of Azerbaijan and extends 3G based technology services in the country to present high class communication services.
